title: Custom Destination Event Planning & Management - Scottsdale| CSI DMC
text:
SCOTTSDALE
Maureen Carter
Senior VP, Global Sales +1 719.491.2953 maureen.carter@csi-dmc.com
CSI DMC SCOTTSDALE
Discover Scottsdale, Arizona, where desert meets luxury. This dazzling oasis is home to over 70 renowned resorts and hotels. It’s truly a golfer’s paradise and spa-goers dream.  Embrace the local ambiance by creating a tranquil sanctuary, a luxe gala, or curating a vibrant cultural experience – it’s your choice in Scottsdale. Outdoor enthusiasts will be captivated by the scenic hiking trails and desert vistas, while golfers will flock to Scottsdale’s premiere golf courses. In the Old Town district, explore a unique blend of modernity and history that is the heart of Scottsdale. Experience the Old West, explore local museums, or sip and stroll along the Scottsdale Wine Trail. Sky Harbor International Airport and Phoenix Mesa Gateway Airport provide easy access to the city, and the free trolly system makes exploring Scottsdale effortless.
